doc.previous: Beyond reducing pilot workload proper trim also increases fuel efficiency by reducing drag For example propeller aircraft have a tendency to yaw when operating at high power for instance when climbing this increases parasite drag because the craft is not flying straight into the apparent wind In such circumstances the use of an adjustable rudder trim tab can reduce yaw
doc.after: The engineer Buckminster Fuller is often cited for his use of trim tabs as a metaphor for leadership and personal empowerment In the February 1972 issue of Playboy Fuller said
